name: ZeroStorefront
long_description: We connect applications to drive more orders and better customer experiences for restaurants. The typical restaurant now uses more than two dozen different applications to run their business. Specifically, we connect, warehouse and route the data to improve analytics, marketing, operations and finance.  Our customers include brands like Frank Pepeâ€™s, Halal Guys, Wings Over and more.
one_liner: #1 Data platform for restaurants. Acquired by Thanx
